column2: ENGLISH
Embrace Ukrainian Culture
Our brethren in Muscovy are adopting foreign customs and speak with ever thicker accents. Perhaps it is time to develop our own distinct culture...
Embrace Russian Culture
Our brethren in Kiev are adopting foreign customs and speak with ever thicker accents. Perhaps it is time to develop our own distinct culture...
Embrace Ruthenian Culture
Our people came to the point where they can no longer consider themselves as  a part of our tribe. Perhaps it is time to lead them not as a tribal chief but as their Ruthenian Prince.
Rule the Tribe of Ulichi
Become High Chief of Ulichi and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Polianians
Become High Chief of Polianians and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Ilmen Slavs
Become High Chief of Ilmen Slavs and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Volhynians
Become High Chief of Volhynians and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Krivichi
Become High Chief of Krivichi and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Severiane
Become High Chief of Severians and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Vyatichi
Become High Chief of Vyatichi and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Dregovichi
Become High Chief of Dregovichi and lead your brethren to glory.
Rule the Tribe of Radimichi
Become High Chief of Radimichi and lead your brethren to glory.
Embrace Rusyn Culture
Our brethren in Kiev and Muscovy are adopting foreign customs and speak with ever thicker accents. Perhaps it is time to develop our own distinct culture...
Create Carpathian Rus
Unite your Rusyn people and lead them to glory as the rulers of Carpathian Mountains.
Hold Kupala Night
Celebrate the summer solstice and the fertility rite with a great festival.
Start Religious Reform in Rus
Reform the faith and choose a new strong religion to replace wicked disorganised paganism in your land.
Hold Koliada
Celebrate the winter solstice and end of the year with a great festival.
